title: It’s Too Soon to be Discouraged!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Hey, are you alright? You seem down.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I guess... you’re right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>The Christmas party’s coming up soon, right? Why aren’t you more excited?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>My report card came...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Oh, I see...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I tried as hard as I could, but my grades didn’t improve at all…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>But it’s not like you need to do supplementary lessons, right? There’s no need to worry then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>R-really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Just ask Nico-chan, Honoka, and Rin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Wait... all three of them!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
